ui.title: Weather Analytics
ui.headline: Precise weather insights for your perfect spot
ui.subheadline: Drop the pin on your favourite place in Germany, choose radius and time range, and get data-driven insights within seconds.
ui.theme_toggle_label: Switch between light and dark display modes
ui.coord_error: Please place the pin within Germany.
ui.reports_subheadline: Analyse historical weather data for any address in Germany – choose radius, time span, and resolution.
ui.start_date_error: Start date needs to be in the past.
ui.end_date_error: End date must be before today and after the start date.
ui.temp_table_description: Measurements inside your radius and period based on the capture-circle algorithm.
ui.temp_table_empty: No temperature samples available for the selected period.

js.markerReturnGermany: Please move the pin back within Germany.
js.placeWithinGermany: Please choose a point within Germany.
js.validateSelectGermany: Please place the pin within Germany.
js.themeToggleAriaDark: Display: dark mode active (click to switch)
js.themeToggleAriaLight: Display: light mode active (click to switch)
js.mapUnavailable: Map service could not be loaded. Please reload or check your network settings.
js.syncUpToDate: Station data already up to date.
js.syncMissing: Station data file missing on server.
js.reportsNoStations: No weather stations found within the selected radius.
js.reportsNoData: No data available for the selected period.
js.reportsError: The report could not be generated.
js.reportsCoverageError: Selected period lies outside the available data.
js.reportsValidationDates: Please choose a period within the available data.

messages.analysis_summary: Analysis for coordinates ({lat}, {lon}) in DE from {start} to {end}.
